text: Watertown, MA - http://skimbox.co/ Skimbox is an intelligent mail app that puts important messages first. It marries the security enterprises need with the style users demand. We are a small team (12) just outside of Boston, MA. Right now, looking for a Full Stack Developer/Dev Ops and Machine Learning Engineer. More info: http://skimbox.co/jobs/ Or just email us: hr@skimbox.co
